scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.deploy-aws: npm run build && cp -f aws.yml serverless.yml && serverless deploy
scripts.deploy-gcf: npm run build && cp -f gcf.yml serverless.yml && serverless deploy
scripts.emulate-gcf: npm run build && cp -f gcf.yml serverless.yml && functions deploy gcf --trigger-http
